description: This table contains a list of street address lines used to store the street address changes for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated street address change in this patient record. Together with PAT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the STREET_ADDRESS_CHANGE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple street address lines that are associated with the patient and the address change from the STREET_ADDRESS_CHANGE_HX table.

columns.name: STREET_ADDRESS
columns.description: Audit trail item used to store the previous street address when a new street address is entered or if the current primary address is edited.
